text: Excited to announce GPT-5.2 — our most reliable model yet for agent workflows. 35% improvement in long-session completion rates.
GPT-5.2 context persistence is genuinely impressive. Ran a 45-min coding session and it kept track of 12 interdependent files without losing state. This is what agents need.
GPT-5.2 is now available. Key improvement: multi-step task reliability. Same pricing as GPT-5. Blog post: https://openai.com/blog/gpt-5-2
Introducing Knowledge Bases for Claude in Cowork — create persistent, updateable knowledge stores that Claude can reference across tasks.
FlashAttention 3.1 is out! 22% throughput improvement on A100, 15% on H100. Drop-in replacement, no API changes needed.
We are pleased to announce HBM4 mass production timeline has been accelerated to Q3 2026, one quarter ahead of schedule.
